welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mers el Hadjad, a charming seaside city known for its beautiful beaches and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Es Senia Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This is the secondary terminal of Es Senia Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network by connecting to the network and following the instructions on the login page.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tafaraoui Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tafaraoui Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
